title: Here are the wallpapers from the Motorola Edge Plus 2022, Edge 30 Pro, and Edge X30
content:
Motorola just released its latest flagship phone for the United States and international markets this week: the Motorola Edge Plus 2022 (called the ‘Edge 30 Pro’ in India and some other countries). It’s nearly identical to the Moto Edge X30 that was released in China near the end of last year, and now you can

The post Here are the wallpapers from the Motorola Edge Plus 2022, Edge 30 Pro, and Edge X30 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: We have all the wallpapers from the Motorola Edge Plus 2022, Edge 30 Pro, and Edge X30 available to download right here.
